ammunitions.name: Arrow
ammunitions.description: Arrow, can be recovered after firing if the shot was not a critical miss.

ammunitions.name: Armour-piercing Arrow
ammunitions.description: Any [ATTACK] made using this arrow have the armour-piercing property, can be recovered after firing if the shot was not a critical miss.

ammunitions.name: Flaming Arrow
ammunitions.description: Before firing the user must spent 1 [AP] to light the arrow on fire. On a hit the target receives [BURNING] 1d4 and [DISTRACTED]. The target can remove these conditions by making a [DT] (10+Item Tier) [TOUGHNESS] [SAVE] for 1 [AP] to remove the arrow. The arrow can not be recovered after firing.
